title: Portal: MVP job runs and artifact surfacing

runbooks.notes: No runbook changes required for this intent.

summary: Make the internal portal a practical operations surface for MVP runs across deployment modes.
Surface the latest bundles/artifacts (overlay, report, bev when present) and show clear run status.
non_goals: Building a full job scheduler UI (keep it minimal for MVP).
success_criteria: Portal shows MVP runs (local + GCP) with status, timestamps, and links to artifacts when present.
Portal clearly shows which deployment mode produced the bundle and any failure reasons.
Portal remains safe (no arbitrary file reads) and errors are actionable.

work_packages.title: Run list + status
items: TASK-PORTAL-JOB-LIST-MVP-001 Add portal surfaces for listing MVP runs across intents/modes.
TASK-PORTAL-RUN-STATUS-MVP-001 Show run status, mode, timestamps, and failure reasons.

work_packages.title: Artifacts
items: TASK-PORTAL-ARTIFACTS-MVP-001 Link to overlay/report/bev artifacts when present and show missing reasons.
